Samasource | VP/Snr Director of Engineering | San Francisco (remote considered)| https://www.samasource.org | Samasource is a successful social enterprise offering training data services to the leaders in artificial intelligence and machine learning. Our vision is to connect people living in poverty around the world to digital work.

Apply: https://samasource.applytojob.com/apply/KyLeaL4xBF/Tech-Inno...
